title: Adonijah Sets Himself Up as King
summary: As David grows old, his son Adonijah attempts to take the throne without David’s approval. With the help of the prophet Nathan and Bathsheba, David appoints Solomon as king. Solomon is anointed, and Adonijah’s followers scatter.

faq.question: Who tried to make himself king without David’s blessing?
How did Solomon become king?
faq.answer: David declared Solomon king publicly and had him anointed at Gihon.
